alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 1:34AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ness, Trego, northern Rush and Ellis Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 133 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Riga, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ellis around 145 AM CDT. Yocemento around 150 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hays, Toulon, Catherine and Victoria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central and west central Kansas.
